sentences.en: a campaign that's been two years in the making.
sentences.cn: 已经准备了两年的一场运动。

sentences.en: Did she do things like bottling fruit or making jam?
sentences.cn: 她干过将水果装瓶或做果酱之类的活计吗？

sentences.en: He accused me of making a great fuss about trivialities.
sentences.cn: 他指责我为丁点琐事大惊小怪。

sentences.en: He admits that a lot of his troubles are entirely of his own making.
sentences.cn: 他承认他的许多麻烦完全是他自己造成的。

sentences.en: He started working for a gallery sweeping up and making the tea.
sentences.cn: 他开始在画廊做扫地沏茶的工作。

sentences.en: He was making a visible effort to control himself.
sentences.cn: 他明显是在努力控制自己的情绪。

sentences.en: Her grandmother had the gift of making people happy.
sentences.cn: 她奶奶有逗人开心的本事。

sentences.en: I am rather chary of making too many idiotic mistakes.
sentences.cn: 我小心翼翼避免犯太多的愚蠢错误。

sentences.en: I saw a man making his way towards me.
sentences.cn: 我看到一名男子向我走来。

sentences.en: Let me just go back to the point I was making.
sentences.cn: 请允许我再回到我刚才所提的观点。

sentences.en: Ludlam was responsible for making Ridiculous Theatre something of a cult.
sentences.cn: 荒诞派戏剧的风靡要归功于勒德拉姆。

sentences.en: Making easy money has always been an attractive proposition.
sentences.cn: 轻松赚钱总是件诱人的事。

sentences.en: Many streams have flooded their banks, making some roads impassable.
sentences.cn: 许多小河的水已经漫过堤岸，造成一些道路不能通行。

sentences.en: people involved in decision making at the highest level
The dogs are always rubbing against the wall and making dirty marks.
sentences.cn: 那些狗老是往墙上蹭，留下了斑斑污迹。

sentences.en: They're making judgments based on a narrowly focused vision of the world.
sentences.cn: 他们的判断是基于一种狭隘的世界观。

sentences.en: this place has been the making of me in many ways.
sentences.cn: 这地方在很多方面促成了我的成功。

sentences.en: We asked women in the biz for their low-down on film-making.
sentences.cn: 我们问了娱乐圈里的女性有关电影制作的内幕。

sentences.en: When your children misbehave tell them without making them feel small.
sentences.cn: 孩子表现不佳时要让他们知道，但不能让他们自惭形秽。

words.tran_cn: 制造者；造物主；出期票人
做，使，安排（make的过去式和过去分词）
使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成

phrases.tran_cn: 保证某人成功；保证某人顺利发展
决议过程，决策过程；决定过程
在发展中；在形成中；在制造中
闭合时间；投入时间；接通时间

trans.tran_cn: 制造，产生的过程，成功改进的手段，原料，材料
